  physical_appearance: This is a brown samfoo with long sleeves and long pants. A mandarin collar is present as well. This samfoo contains orange piping at its collar and its side fastenings. The edges of the cuffs contain white piping. There are three buttons above the piping which ends just below the point where the left sleeve begins. There are no visible tears on the samfoo. There are vertical crease lines present on both the shirt and pants.

  subject_terms_1: unisex clothing

  subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume

  subject_terms_3: Ethnic costume Chinese costume

  sgcool_label_text: The samfoo is a traditional Chinese outfit which consists of a top (‘sam’) with side fastenings and a mandarin collar
 worn over a pair of pants (‘foo’). Traditionally
 the samfoo is loose fitting and its cut makes it convenient for the wearer to carry out everyday activities.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a brown samfoo with long sleeves and long pants. A mandarin collar is present as well. This samfoo contains orange piping at its collar and its side fastenings. The edges of the cuffs contain white piping. There are three buttons above the piping which ends just below the point where the left sleeve begins. There are no visible tears on the samfoo. There are vertical crease lines present on both the shirt and pants.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: The samfoo is a traditional Chinese outfit which consists of a top (‘sam’) with side fastenings and a mandarin collar, worn over a pair of pants (‘foo’). Traditionally, the samfoo is loose fitting and its cut makes it convenient for the wearer to carry out everyday activities.
